subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1. National Human Development Report for Viet Nam
2a. Improved capacity for research management in 6 trial institutes
2b. Improved National capacity for research management
3. Improved capacity for Evidence Based Policy Advocacy
4. Improved research within Vietnam Academy of Social Sciences
subproject.title: Evidence-based Policy Making
